org.chemicalmozart.utils

Class MusicWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chemicalmozart.utils.MusicWriter

  • public class MusicWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to export the track into a midi file
    Author:
    Andreolli Cédric, Boulanger Chloé, Cléro Olivier, Guellier Antoine, Guilloux Sébastien, Templé Arthur
